title: How is the service provided by BBNL broadband? - Quora

response.answer_text: BBNL gave franchise to sub contractors and it will split into area wise…. as same as cable network. So service wise good depends on the sub contractors. Check in your area about the services. In my case I have applied for a new connection and they responded immediately and i got the connection very next day. so far no issues.. services are excellent… I am in kengeri satellite town… i never felt the internet was down. i am working from home from the last 2 months and i was happy with BBNL…

BBNL Unlimited Broadband , Best broadband service provider in Bangalore I say. I stay in Rajajinagar and have connection of Unlimited 50mbps plan from past 6 months. Positive points - Cheap and Unlimited bandwidth. - Never faced a single issue regarding the connection. - Speed was never reduced even if it was unlimited plan. - Customer care people reach you in minutes if you face any issue and resolve. - Very polite and flexible with the payment dates. Negative points - Only thing is they need to improvise their mobile app as I have faced issue with the payment once. - Nothing as such regarding the connectivity and speed.
